All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ApplicationObject
Represents a basic application object with an identifier (ID) and a name.
Appointment
Represents an appointment within the scheduling application.
AppointmentDAO
 
CChoulesDevTools
Developer tools authored by Cody Choules, commonly used tools for ease of use during development that can be easily turned off for non-development environments.
CChoulesJTools
Utility class containing tools for JavaFX applications created by Cody Choules.
Contact
This is the class for the Contacts from the DataBase I actually do know for sure what they are in terms of Customer relationship.
ContactDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling operations related to contacts in the database.
Country
Represents a Country object from the DB.
CountryDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling operations related to Country in the database.
Customer
Represents a Customer object from the DB.
CustomerDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling operations related to Customer in the database.
DarkModeTool
Utility class for managing dark mode across the project.
FirstLvlDivision
Represents a First Level Division object such as a provence or a state from the DB.
FirstLvlDivisionDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling operations related to First Level Divisions in the database.
GeneralTools
Utility class for common tasks in java.
JDBTools
Utility class for managing JDBC connections and handling time conversions.
LocalDateTimeApplicationTool
Utility class for handling LocalDateTime operations in JavaFX applications.
LoginWindow
LoginWindow Controller for controlling the login window and authorizing user input.
Main
 
PrimeWindow
Controller class for the PrimeWindow FXML.
SchedulingApplicationPrompt
A class that provides various methods for displaying custom prompts using JavaFX popups and prompts This must be instantiated as a new SchedulingApplicationPrompt
Searcher
The `Searcher` class provides methods for handling search functionality in the scheduling application's GUI.
TimeGetterTool
 
TimeTool
Utility class for handling time-related operations in this specific application.
User
Represents a User within the application.
UserDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling operations related to users in the database during login.
ViewAppointments
Controller class for managing appointments in the appointments tab of the project.
ViewCustomers
Controller class for managing customer-related functionality.
ViewReports
The ViewReports class manages the report tables of the application.
ViewReports.totalsReport
Inner class representing a totals report to be utilized by a report table
